properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 4 at 8:14PM PST until January 6 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph are possible in the hills.

* WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County
Coastal Valleys, Santa Clarita Valley and San Fernando Valley.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Sunday to 3 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may be affected on Interstate 5 and
the 14, 101, 118, 126, 170, 210, and 405 freeways.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SUNDAY TO 3 PM PST MONDAY
